experience.description: My own software company specialising in software development, web development and custom integrations. Worked with many local businesses to get them online.
Working in a fast startup environment, maintaining multiple applications and implementing new features with React, Nextjs, Node, AWS, GraphQL, Jest and Apollo.
Migrating the legacy PHP codebase to a modern micro frontends architecture using ReactJS and Node.js whilst maintaining and providing bugfixes on existing codebase.
Played a huge part in setting the foundation for migrating the ‘monolith’ to a modern, microprojects frontend architecture, by building new components with ReactJS/Nextjs and Redux.
Worked on multiple projects for various confidential and FTSE 100 clients and gained great knowledge and experience with many skills.
